name: Send It
description:
Send It is a free-wheeling casual game about package delivery. Launch packages through windows, plough through construction sites, and careen through the backyards of a gated community all to achieve the most important thing: customer satisfaction. When customers need a package, and need it now, they turn to you and your professional indifference to the basic rules of the road to make it happen. When you need something delivered, don’t just get it shipped. Send It.

How to play

Basic rules of the game: 

Launch packages at targets (highlighted in yellow) as quickly and accurately as possible. The faster and more accurate you are, the more points you score.

Send It can be played with a mouse and keyboard or with a gamepad. We recommend a gamepad. Below are the basic controls for each.

Gamepad Controls:

Left stick for movement and steering. Right stick for aiming your shots. Right trigger for charge (low-arc long distance) shots. Use the right trigger and left trigger together for lob shots (high-arc short distance). 

Mouse and Keyboard Controls:

WSAD for movement and steering. Mouse for aiming shots. Use the right mouse button and left mouse button together for lob shots (high-arc short distance).
